import React, { useState } from "react"; import './Login.css'; export default function (props) { let [authMode, setAuthMode] = useState("signin") const changeAuthMode = () => { setAuthMode(authMode === "signin" ? "signup" : "signin") } if (authMode === "signin") { return (
